trans-unit.source: Manages keyboard focus within the container.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia o foco do teclado dentro do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This interface implements keyboard message management in WPF-Win32 interoperation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface implementa o gerenciamento de mensagens de teclado em cenários de interoperação WPF-Win32.

trans-unit.source: A container should provide a unique instance of this interface for each of its contained components.
trans-unit.target: Um contêiner deve fornecer uma instância exclusiva dessa interface para cada um de seus componentes independentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> interface and the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink> are used together to provide support for keyboard actions across interoperation boundaries.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> interface e o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink> são usados juntos para fornecer suporte para ações de teclado em limites de interoperação.

trans-unit.source: A site (<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> implementation) represents a parent of a sink (<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>).
trans-unit.target: Um site (<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> implementação) representa um pai de um coletor (<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>).

trans-unit.source: The sink (<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>) implements the majority of keyboard behavior.
trans-unit.target: O coletor (<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink>) implementa a maioria do comportamento do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Each site must also provide a sink, because the site-specific sink is returned by a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> interface.
trans-unit.target: Cada site também deve fornecer um coletor, pois o coletor específicas do site é retornado por uma propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> interface.

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of the input architecture specifically implemented for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] interoperation, see [Windows Forms and WPF Interoperability Input Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma discussão da arquitetura de entrada implementada especificamente para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] interoperação, consulte [Windows Forms e arquitetura de entrada de interoperabilidade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperation scenarios, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] cenários de interoperabilidade, consulte [WPF e Win32 interoperação](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md).

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether focus should be set to the first or the last tab stop.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o foco deve ser definido para a primeira ou a última parada de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Called by a contained component when it has reached its last tab stop and has no further items to tab to.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por um componente independente quando ele atingiu sua última parada de tabulação e não tem mais itens para os quais tabular.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <see langword="true" />, the site has shifted focus to another component.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método retornar <see langword="true" />, o site terá alterado o foco para outro componente.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <see langword="false" />, focus is still within the calling component.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método retornar <see langword="false" />, o foco ainda estará dentro do componente de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The component should "wrap around" and set focus to its first contained tab stop.
trans-unit.target: O componente deve "encapsular" e definir o foco para a primeira parada de tabulação independente.

trans-unit.source: Components call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A> when the component attempts a requested focus move but there are no further tab stops in that direction within that own component.
trans-unit.target: Chamada de componentes <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A> quando o componente tenta mover um foco solicitada, mas não há nenhuma outra guia interrompe nessa direção dentro do próprio componente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard sink associated with this site.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o coletor de teclado associado a este site.

trans-unit.source: The current site's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: O site atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink" /> interface.

trans-unit.source: This property does not return the parent <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink> interface.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não retorna o pai <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink> interface.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters a child keyboard input sink from this site.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o registro de um coletor de entrada de teclado filho deste site.

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect the site on the container.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não afeta o site no contêiner.
